pages.text: $(li)The Birch Forest is a temperate forested biome composed mainly of Birch trees that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find some vegetation like Birch Trees, Peonies, Pink Clovers, Oyexe Daisies, Poppies, Dandelions, Lilacs and Rose Bushes.

$(li)Some animals such as $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/grizzly_bear)Grizzly Bears$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/deer)Deer$(/l) can be found here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Birch Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
